column5: Steve. Looking forward to your reports!
Second that motion here too Steve.
Steve we've never met but I just started into Salmon fishing on Lake O this summer and I missed your big water reports...
Another prodigal son has returned (see other thread by Mahumba)...  Welcome back  Mike
Yeah I have missed seeing you around here too Steve.  Cheers, ben.
Welcome back Steve, looking forward to your reports. They have been missed

STEVE'S BACK, STEVE'S BACK  OK, where is he?????  We need a post, with pictures, with bodily damage, or maybe its too early for that, not cold enough for slippery conditions on stairs and docks.  But, its still early,
I have to admit, I loved all the big water salmon pics and reports as well.....Steves reports gave me the itch to try myself
Nice to hear you're still around bud.  Looking forward to those pics and reports.
YUP!... what everybody else said!... Welcome Back!!!
Glad to hear your back kid! Smile!
I too missed his reports. The pics were great, his writing skills unsurpassed.  If he is infact back, why no response or activity on any other thread.  Oh yeah.....glad your back!
